title: Stellar System
description: Easily create dynamic orbital systems. Customize suns, planets, and satellites for stunning space scenes
longDescription:
Trailer V1.1: Watch here



Trailer V1: Watch here



Stellar System is a powerful C++ plugin for Unreal Engine, now with full multiplayer support, designed to let developers effortlessly create breathtaking and dynamic orbital systems. Ideal for sci-fi games, space exploration adventures, or cosmic simulations, Stellar System provides a user-friendly framework with endless customization options and seamless integration with other UE5 plugins.





Why Choose Stellar System?

Stellar System's modular and flexible design allows you to craft unique orbital systems that are now fully replicated for multiplayer experiences. This plugin empowers you to bring your vision to life, creating a polished and distinctive game experience with realistic celestial mechanics, whether in single-player or multiplayer settings.

With Stellar System, there's no need to modify its code. Instead, you can extend its functionalities and use its modules to build upon it, resulting in a clean, decoupled codebase that remains solid and scalable. The plugin integrates directly into the engine, ensuring your custom code stays intact with each update, providing a safe and reliable workflow, and now works smoothly alongside other UE5 marketplace assets.





Do I Need to Know C++ to Work with Stellar System?

Absolutely not. Stellar System is designed to be fully functional without any C++ knowledge. Everything is exposed to Blueprints, allowing you to expand and customize without writing a single line of code.


Join the Discord for technical support

Note: Assets shown in preview are not included.





Upcoming Features:

  • Advanced Orbital Dynamics
  • Planetary Details and Environments
  • Dynamic Events and Anomalies
  • Visual and Graphical Enhancements
  • User Interface and HUD Improvements
  • Interactive Celestial Objects
  • Educational and Simulation Tools

The price will increase with each new feature added.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Procedural Stellar System Generation
  • Realistic Orbital Mechanics
  • Customization of Celestial Objects
  • Collision Prevention System
  • Real-Time Visualization
  • Extensible Framework
  • Dynamic Simulation
  • Multiplayer Replication
  • Compatibility with other UE5 marketplace assets


Code Modules: Stellar system (runtime)


Number of Blueprints: 2

Number of C++ Classes: 6

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: PC, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PS4, PS5, Android, MacOs

Supported Target Build Platforms: PC, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PS4, PS5, Android, MacOs

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1a2yNkjTxYDDYCkMp_H-oKr8KS-9PzSYk
